boardgame.name: The Ancient World
Un Monde oublié
Die Vergessene Welt
Древний Мир
boardgame.description: In an ancient world forgotten by time, enormous titans terrorize the land. Five tribes have been fleeing from the titans for centuries, but things are about to change. Growing city-states pledge to end the reign of terror, determined to take on the titans and make the world a safer place for all. Each city-state competes to attract the tribes, eager for the strength of the combined peoples, who are now leaving behind old traditions with the hope that the titans can be defeated once and for all._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In The Ancient World, players compete to grow the largest and most influential city-state by managing citizens, treasury, and military and by defeating titans. Players take turns sending citizens to take special actions or using military cards to attack titans. One of the actions a citizen can perform is to build Empire cards, which give more citizens, money, and abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A city-state's influence in the world is measured by sets of tribe banners that it owns. Each Empire card has one or more tribe banners, and tribe banners can also be gained by defeating titans. Players gain victory points (VPs) for sets of tribe banners. After six rounds, the player with the most VPs from sets of tribe banners wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Red Raven Games (RVM006) In an ancient world forgotten by time, enormous titans terrorize the land. The five tribes have been fleeing from the titans for centuries, but things are about to change. Growing kingdoms pledge to end the reign of terror, determined to take on the titans and make the world a safer place for all. Each kingdom competes to attract the tribes, eager for the strength of the combined peoples, who are now leaving behind old traditions with the hope that the titans can be defeated once and for all.

Payment can be made through secure order form at www.spiritgames.co.uk or by Paypal (salnphil@spiritgames.co.uk £1 fee, invoice on request) UK Postage £5.00 First Class Overseas Postage at cost - please email us. There is a discount for larger games or several game bought together: 5% over £50 total games value 10% over £100 total games value Max UK Postage £5.00.
for sale only to the bgg user who won it at this auction: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/184457/rahdo-runs-through-his-5th-auction-usa-only

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: English Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment (Kiala or DHL4you) or € 6,75 per shipment (PostNL). Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is Euro 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)

Red Raven Games (RVM006) In an ancient world forgotten by time, enormous titans terrorize the land. The five tribes have been fleeing from the titans for centuries, but things are about to change. Growing kingdoms pledge to end the reign of terror, determined to take on the titans and make the world a safer place for all. Each kingdom competes to attract the tribes, eager for the strength of the combined peoples, who are now leaving behind old traditions with the hope that the titans can be defeated once and for all.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.
In good condition, all components present. Includes the frog god statue promo. Free shipping.

Everything is in great shape. Included as well: The Ancient World: The Frog God Statue Promo The Ancient World: Temple Promo The Ancient World: Citadel of Ivories Promo Local Pickup possible. Shipping will be USPS Flat Rate $13
